CustomField.description: Select the most appropriate risk rating (severity)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the most appropriate risk rating (severity)
CustomField.label: Risk rating- severity

value.fullName: 1 – insignificant – trivial or no effect on service, rolling stock or infrastructure.
value.label: 1 – insignificant – trivial or no effect on service, rolling stock or infrastructure.

value.fullName: 2 – Staff / Passenger minor injury requiring 1st aid, Service Delay of 5 mins or Rolling stock / infrastructure damage up to £1000
value.label: 2 – Staff / Passenger minor injury requiring 1st aid, Service Delay of 5 mins or Rolling stock / infrastructure damage up to £1000

value.fullName: 3 – Major injury requiring hospitalisation / RIDDOR, Service cancellation, Damage up to £10k
value.label: 3 – Major injury requiring hospitalisation / RIDDOR, Service cancellation, Damage up to £10k

value.fullName: 4 – Serious injury – loss of eye/ limb. Multiple service cancellations. Damage up to £100k
value.label: 4 – Serious injury – loss of eye/ limb. Multiple service cancellations. Damage up to £100k

value.fullName: 5 – Fatality. Long term disruption to service / Fleet out of service. Catastrophic damage in excess of £100k.
value.label: 5 – Fatality. Long term disruption to service / Fleet out of service. Catastrophic damage in excess of £100k.
